lines.text: Now that was quite a load to have to explode. What a lovely lass, I had to blow up your ass but now I must hit the road!
There was an old man of Madras whose balls were made of fine brass. So in stormy weather they both clang together and sparks flew out of his ass.
For pulling this trick, I'll chop off your dick!
Ahhh... lovely golden palaces completely full of riches. I'll rip 'em off and rob 'em blind, those dirty sons of bitches.
Now listen to me! This may mean the difference between living and dying. Do you have health insurance?
Do ya take Green Cross?
There once was a lady of Totten whose tastes grew perverted and rotten. She cared not for steaks or for pastries and cakes, but lived upon penis au gratin.
Metallica. No, wait... White Zombie. I got the album. Enjoy your spuds!
What the hell did I just say?
I want my gold shilling. Tell me where it is or there will be another killing.
Who the hell are you?
I'm a leprechaun me lass, and I'm gonna make you pay.
What do you want?
Your boobs are big. Your butt is small. But still you're in for quite a fall.
What are you talking about?
Oh, well didn't you hear? Bigger is good, but jumbo is dear. I'll give ya boobs that'll come out to here.
All right, let's just start with every test that starts with the letter A, tomorrow we'll do the B's, and then Thursday...
You play golf on Thursday.
Well, this is an emergency.
Let me go, you son of a bitch!
Now that's no way to speak about me mother, bless her green soul.

[on the phone]
Yeah, give me hotel security. Yeah, I'd like to report a leprechaun in your hotel. No, a LEPRECHAUN. Yeah, little green guy. HE TRIED TO KILL ME! Hello?
Have you ever blown a rod before?
I beg your pardon?
The engine, I meant. See, you got your pistons and your rods... You don't want to know this, right?
No, actually, I don't.
Sorry I'm late, Fazio.
I told you, you will address me as Great One offstage and on.
You're a magician, not the Pope.

[to Leprechaun]
Tell me, what was Judy Garland really like?
You want magic? Bend over. I'll pull a rabbit out of your ass.
Excuse me, where can I cash a check?
You old enough to be in here, kid?
[sees the amount of Scott's check]
Yes, you're old enough. Right over there. If there's anything you need, just come to me.
Look sharp, be sharp.
No, tell him the other thing. The threat thing.
Oh. You pay Arthur the money you owe him or I will kill you.
What are you, tough guys? I got hemorrhoids tougher than you.
Ladies and gentlemen, due to a slight solicrivilance in the stem of the wheel, the situation is thus - this table is now closed.
Mmm, I like Indian food. So spicy!

[Leprechaun has turned his white rabbit into a pile of dung]
Oh, shit!
00. It comes from my shillelagh. You can keep it in a crock. Ha ha.
What do I want? I want brown hair. I want health insurance for all Americans. I want the Mets to get their shit together.
I thought maybe you could sneak me inside the casino to see what it's like.
What? Do you think this is like Disneyland or something?

[as he's being sawn in half]
Caesar's... Palace...
He's a good luck charm.
Yes, I can see it's working very well.
